units.title: Cell centrifugation and resuspension
units.text: Cells were centrifuged for 5 min at 200g and resuspended in mTeSR1,
units.rationale: Prepares a uniform cell suspension for downstream processing.

units.title: Filtration through 20‑µm strainer
units.text: filtered through a 20-μm strainer and washed with mTeSR1.
units.rationale: Removes clumps and debris to obtain a single‑cell suspension.

units.title: Organoid washing and fixation
units.text: Organoids were washed in PBS before fixing in 4% PFA for 2–4 h.
units.rationale: Preserves tissue morphology prior to downstream histology.

units.title: Cryoprotection in sucrose
units.text: The excess of fixative was removed with three PBS washes and organoids were then transferred to a 30% sucrose solution for 24–48 h for cryoprotection.
units.rationale: Prevents ice crystal formation during freezing.

units.title: Embedding and snap‑freezing
units.text: Organoids were transferred to plastic cryomolds (Tissue Tek) and embedded in OCT compound 4583 (Tissue Tek) for snap‑freezing on dry ice.
units.rationale: Creates a solid block suitable for cryosectioning.

units.title: Antigen retrieval incubation
units.text: Sections were incubated in antigen retrieval solution (HistoVT One, 70 °C for 20 min).

units.title: Blocking‑permeabilizing step
units.text: Sections were incubated in blocking‑permeabilizing solution (0.3 % Triton, 0.2 % Tween‑20 and 5 % normal goat serum in PBS) for 1 h at room temperature.
units.rationale: Reduces non‑specific antibody binding and permeabilizes membranes.

units.title: Primary antibody overnight incubation
units.text: Sections were incubated overnight at 4 °C in blocking‑permeabilizing solution containing antibodies anti‑PAX6 (mouse, 1:1,000, Thermo Fisher,
units.rationale: Allows specific binding of the primary antibody to its target.

units.title: Papain dissociation of organoid pieces
units.text: Organoid pieces were incubated in Papain at 37 °C (enzyme mix 1) for an initial 15 min, followed by addition of Enzyme A (enzyme mix 2) to the Papain mix.
units.rationale: Enzymatically dissociates tissue into single cells.

units.title: Cell counting and loading onto 10x chip
units.text: Cells were then analysed using Trypan Blue assay, counted using the automated cell counter Countess (Thermo Fisher), and diluted for an appropriate concentration to obtain approximately 6,000 cells per lane of a 10x microfluidic chip device.
units.rationale: Ensures accurate cell input for single‑cell library preparation.
